original: 'dhvanimārgo manāk spṛṣṭo 'pi na lakṣitaḥ 'ityamuṃ bhāgaṃ pūrvaṃpakṣopakṣepānuguṇyena vyācaṣṭe-taistāvadityādi /

original: śabdasamarpyamāṇāḥ hṛdayasaṃvādasundarāśca ye vibhāvānubhāvāḥ teṣāṃ samucitāḥ prākjanmanaḥ
analyzed: śabda samarpyamāṇāḥ hṛdaya saṃvāda sundarāḥ ca ye vibhāva anubhāvāḥ teṣām samucitāḥ prāc janmanaḥ

original: ārabhya “na hyetaccittavṛttiśūnyaḥ prāṇī bhavatī“tyuktadiśā ātmani viśeṣato niviṣṭāḥ

original: sukumārā rasacarvaṇayogyatāṃ gatā yā svasya carvayituḥ sahṛdayasya saṃvit samyagvettyanayeti saṃvinmanaḥ,

original: tasyā ya ānandamayaḥ carvaṇārūpo vyāpāraḥ tena,

original: yathā-- bhama dhammia vīsattho so suṇao ajja mārio deṇa /

original: abhidheyameva sāmarthyaṃ sahakāriśaktirūpaṃ vibhāvādikaṃ rasadhvanane śabdasya kartavye,
analyzed: abhidheyam eva sāmarthyam sahakāri śakti rūpam vibhāva ādikam rasa dhvanane śabdasya kartavye

original: cānumānavyatirikte dhvanane kartavye sāmarthyaṃ śaktiḥ viśiṣṭasamucito vācakasākalyamiti
analyzed: ca anumāna vyatirikte dhvanane kartavye sāmarthyam śaktiḥ viśiṣṭa samucitaḥ vācaka sākalyam iti

original: yena siddhavannirdeśa ityāśaṅkāṃ pariharan parābhimatasyaiva kāvyarūpatvaprasañjanābhiprāyeyamuktirityāha---tava mata ityādi /
analyzed: yena siddha vat nirdeśaḥ iti āśaṅkām pariharan para abhimatasya eva kāvya rūpa tva prasañjana abhiprāyā iyam uktiḥ iti āha tava mataḥ ityādi

original: svaśabdakṛtā rasādipratītiḥ na vibhāvādikṛtetyasmin mate kāvyatvenānabhimatamapi kāvyamāpadyetetyarthaḥ /

tathāvidham eva udāharaṇam āha śṛṅgāra iti
yatas ca ityādi vṛtti granthasya ānarthakya śaṅkām upasaṃhāra tva uktyā śamayan āha evam ityādi
vṛttau abhidheya sāmarthya ākṣipta tvam upasaṃhṛtam
tat tu śabda artha ubhaya gata dhvanana vyāpāra gamya tva rūpam iti vyācaṣṭe abhidheyam eva ityādi
sāmarthya padasya vivaraṇam saha ityādi
sahakāri eva śāktiḥ śaknoti anayā iti śaktiḥ tad rūpam
tat kim iti atra āha vibhāva ādikam iti
dhvanane iti ākṣepa pada vyākhyānam

original: karmadhārayāśrayaṇena śabde yojayitvā ṣaṣṭītatpuruṣāśrayeṇārthe yojayati---abhidheyasya yetyādi /

abhidheyasya iti asya dhvanane iti anena sambandhaḥ
bhinna yogakṣema tayā bhinna svabhāva tayā
putra janma khalu harṣa janayati

original: na tathā vibhāvādyartho rasaṃ janayatīti tadvilakṣṇatvamarthagatadhvananasya /

original: mahākavinā pratyabhijñeyāvi'viti 'tāveva śabdārthau mahākaveḥ pratyabhijñetyāvi'ti ca yojanā bodhyā /
analyzed: mahā kavinā tau eva śabda arthau mahā kaveḥ ca yojanā bodhyā

original: dhvaniriti idānīṃ vyaṅgyavyañjakayoḥ prādhānye 'pi yadvācyavācakāveva prathamamupādadate kavayastadapi yuktamevetyāha--
analyzed: dhvaniḥ iti idānīm vyaṅgya vyañjakayoḥ prādhānye yat vācya vācakau eva prathamam upādadate kavayaḥ tat api yuktam eva iti āha
āloka arthī yathā dīpa śikhāyām yatnavām janaḥ

āloka arthī yathā dīpa śikhāyām yatnavān janaḥ

original: yathā hyālokārthī sannapi dīpaśikhāyāṃ yatnavāñjano bhavati tadupāyatayā /

na ca evam locanam bādhakena vidhurīkṛta tā iti arthaḥ
tasya iti śabdasya
duṣṭa tā eva iti

original: prayojanāvagamasya sukhasampattye hi sa śabdaḥ prayujyate tasminnamukhyārthe /
analyzed: prayojana avagamasya sukha sampattye hi sa śabdaḥ prayujyate tasmin a mukhya arthe

original: yadi ca 'siṃho vaṭuḥ' iti śauryātiśaye 'pyavagamayitavye skhaladgatitvaṃ śabdasya tarhi tatparatītiṃ naiva kuryāditi kimarthaṃ tasya prayogaḥ
analyzed: yadi ca siṃhaḥ vaṭuḥ iti śaurya atiśaye pi avagamayitavye skhalat gati tvam śabdasya tarhi tad para tītim nā eva kuryāt iti kimartham tasya prayogaḥ

original: upacārema kariṣyatīti cettatrāpi prayojanāntaramanveṣyaṃ tatrāpyupacāra ityanavasthā /
analyzed: kariṣyati iti ced tatra api prayojana antaram anveṣyam tatra api upacāraḥ iti anavasthā
atha na tatra skhalat gati tvam

original: tarhi prayojane 'vagamayitavye na lakṣaṇākhyo vyāpāraḥ tatsāmagryabhāvāt /
analyzed: tarhi prayojane vagamayitavye na lakṣaṇa ākhyaḥ vyāpāraḥ tad sāmagrī abhāvāt
na ca na asti vyāpāraḥ
na ca asau abhidhā
samayasya tatra abhāvāt
yat vyāpāra antaram abhidhā lakṣaṇa atiriktam sa dhvanana vyāpāraḥ
na bāla priyāḥ iti pāṭham abhipretya evam vyākhyātam

original: 'cārutvātiśayaviśiṣṭārthaprakāśanalakṣaṇa' iti pāṭhe tu kartavya ityasyotpādayitavye ityevārthaḥ /
analyzed: cāru tva atiśaya viśiṣṭa artha prakāśana lakṣaṇaḥ iti pāṭhe tu kartavyaḥ iti asya utpādayitavye iti eva arthaḥ

original: prayojane bodhye skhaladgatitvasya niṣedhānnāmukhyatāpadena tadeva vivakṣitamityāha---bādhakenetyādi /
analyzed: prayojane bodhye skhalat gati tvasya niṣedhāt na amukhya tā padena tat eva vivakṣitam iti āha bādhakena ityādi
nanu ukta rūpa amukhyatva abhyupagamaḥ katham duṣṭatva āpādakaḥ

original: duṣṭatvaṃ hi vyākaraṇasaṃskārarāhityādirūpamiti śaṅkāyāṃ pratipipādayiṣitārthapratītyajanakatvena vaiyarthyam;
analyzed: duṣṭa tvam hi vyākaraṇa saṃskāra rāhitya ādi rūpam iti śaṅkāyām vaiyarthyam
tat atra vavikṣitam iti āha prayojana ityādi
prayojana avagamasya śaurya atiśaya ādeḥ bodhasya
sukha sampattaye sukhena jananāya
sa śabdaḥ siṃha ādiḥ lakṣaka śabdaḥ
tasmin a mukhya arthe iti
vaṭu ādi arthe iti arthaḥ
kim atas tatra āha yadi ca iti
śaurya iti
yathā vaṭau tatā śaurya atiśaye
tad pratītim śaurya atiśaya pratītim kimartham iti
tad prayogasya vaiyarthya āpātaḥ iti arthaḥ

original: atha prayojane dhvananavyāpāraṃ vyavasthāpayiṣyan uktamevārthaṃ śaṅkāparihārābhyā pradarśayannāha---upacāreṇetyādi /
analyzed: atha prayojane dhvanana vyāpāram vyavasthāpayiṣyan uktam eva artham śaṅkā parihārābhyā pradarśayan āha aupacāreṇa ityādi
kariṣyati iti atra tad pratītim tasya prayogaḥ iti ca anuṣajyate

prayojana antaram anviṣyam iti
lakṣaṇāyāḥ prayojana niyata tvena anyat prayojanam kiñcid eṣitavyam iti arthaḥ
tatra api iti

original: tasmin prayojane 'pi upacāre pūrvavadaṅgīkārye tatrāpyanyadevaṃ tatrāpyanyadityanavasthā mūlakṣayakāriṇī syādityarthaḥ /
analyzed: tasmin prayojane upacāre pūrvavat aṅgīkārye tatra api anyat evam tatra api anyat iti anavasthā mūla kṣaya kāriṇī syāt iti arthaḥ

original: ataḥ skhaladgatitvābhyupagamo na yukta iti bhāvaḥ /
analyzed: atas skhalat gati tva abhyupagamaḥ na yuktaḥ iti bhāvaḥ
nanu mā bhūt skhalit agati tvam

original: tathāpi lakṣaṇāyā abhāvaḥ kuta ityata āha---athetyādi /

original: tena yataḥ skhaladgateśśabdasya vyāpāro lakṣaṇā, tato hetoḥ /

original: vyañjakatvaika-mūlasya dhvaneḥ syāl lakṣaṇaṃ katham // DhvK_1.18 //
analyzed: vyañjaka tva eka mūlasya dhvaneḥ syāt lakṣaṇam katham

avyāptiḥ api asya lakṣaṇasya

original: na ca prayoge duṣṭatā kācit prayojanasyābidhnenaiva pratīteḥ /
analyzed: na ca prayoge duṣṭa tā kācid prayojanasya a bidhnena eva pratīteḥ

original: tenābhidhaiva mukhye 'rthe bādhakena pravivitsurnirudhyamānā satī acaritārthatvādanyatra prasarati /
analyzed: tena abhidhā eva mukhye rthe bādhakena pravivitsuḥ nirudhyamānā satī acaritārtha tvāt anyatra prasarati
atas eva amukhyaḥ sya ayam arthaḥ iti vyavahāraḥ
tathā eva ca amukhya tayā saṅgeta grahaṇam api tatra asti iti abhidhā puccha bhūtā eva lakṣaṇā
upasaṃharati tasmāt iti
yatas bhidhā puccha bhūtā eva lakṣaṇā

original: tato hetorvācakatvamabhidhāvyāpāramāśritā tadbādhanenotthānāttatpucchabhūtatvāccha guṇavṛttiḥ gauṇalākṣaṇikakāra ityarthaḥ /

sā katham dhvaneḥ vyañjana ātmanaḥ lakṣaṇam syāt
bhinna viṣaya tvāt iti
etat upasaṃharati tasmāt iti
yatas tivyāptiḥ uktā tad prasaṅgena ca bhinna viṣaya tvam

original: evam 'ativyāpteratāvyāpterna cāsau lakṣyate tayā' iti kārikāgatātivyāptiṃ vyākhyāyāvyāptiṃ vyācaṣṭe---avyāptirapyasyeti /
analyzed: evam ativyāpteḥ atāvyāpteḥ na ca asau lakṣyate tayā iti kārikā gata ativyāptim vyākhyāya avyāptim vyācaṣṭe avyāptiḥ api asya iti
asya guṇa vṛtti rūpasya iti arthaḥ

abhidhā eva anyatra prasarati iti anvayaḥ

atra api hetum āha mukhye rthe ityādi

original: bādhakenetyanantaraṃ vidhurīkṛteti ca kvacit granthe pāṭhaḥ /

original: yathā pravāhādikamuddiśya gaṅgādiśabdasyāyaṃ mukhyārtha iti vyavahāraḥ,

original: tathā ca dvayorarthatvaṃ tulyaṃ mukhyatvāmukhyatvakṛta eva bheda iti bhāvaḥ /

original: na he śabdasya yaḥ kaścidevāṃmukhyo 'rthaḥ kintvayamartho 'sya śabdasyāmukhya iti niyata evetyatastathāvidhopadeśarūpasya /
analyzed: na he śabdasya yaḥ kaścid evāṃmukhyaḥ rthaḥ kintu ayam arthaḥ sya śabdasya amukhyaḥ iti niyataḥ eva iti atas tathāvidha upadeśa rūpasya

original: ayamartho 'smācchabdādboddhavya iti icchārūpasya vā saṅketasya grahamamapītyarthaḥ /

vistṛtam idam kāvyaprakāśa saṅkete
upasaṃharati tasmāt iti iti

original: tasmādityasiya kīrukayī sambandhaṃ darsayaṃstatpadaṃ vyācaṣṭe---yata ityādi /

original: anye ca bahavaḥ prakārā bhaktyā vyāpyante;

śakhariṇī ityādau lakṣaṇa aṅgīkāraḥ pūrva pradarśitaḥ eva iti arthaḥ
pṛcchati katham tarhi iti
vṛttau vivakṣitā anya parā iti uktam katham saṅgacchate iti arthaḥ
lakṣaṇāyām satyām vācyasya vivakṣita tva asambhavāt iti bhāvaḥ
uttaram āha tad bhedaḥ iti

original: vṛttau vivakṣitānyaparavācyaśabdena tadavāntarabhedo mukhyo 'saṃlakṣyakramo vivakṣita ityarthaḥ /
analyzed: vṛttau vivakṣita anya para vācya śabdena tad avāntarabhedaḥ saṃlakṣya kramaḥ vivakṣitaḥ iti arthaḥ
tad bheda śabdena iti
vṛttau tad bheda prakārāḥ iti atra tad bheda śabdena iti arthaḥ
tad avāntarabhedāḥ ca iti
śṛṅgāra hāsya ādayaḥ ca iti arthaḥ

original: atrāpi lakṣaṇā kinna syādata āha--na ceti /
analyzed: atra api lakṣaṇā kinna syāt atas āha na ca iti
anupapattim vivṛṇoti tathā hi iti
bādhaka anupraveśaḥ api iti api śabdaḥ prayojanasya samuccāyakaḥ
śaṅkate nanu iti
kim bādhaya iti

original: asti vā nāsti veti cintitayā mukhyārthabādhayā kiṃ phalamityarthaḥ /
analyzed: asti vā na asti vā iti cintitayā mukhya artha bādhayā kim phalam iti arthaḥ
iyat eva iti
vakṣyamāṇam eva iti arthaḥ
abhi iti

original: abhidheyenāvinābhūtasya kenāpi sambandhena sambaddhasya pratītirjñānaṃ taddheturvā /
analyzed: abhidheyena avinābhūtasya kena api sambandhena sambaddhasya pratītiḥ jñānam tad hetuḥ vā
iti iti
iti bhaṭṭa vārtika uktam iti arthaḥ
pu kṛte saṅgamayati iha ityādi

rasa ādayaḥ avinābhūtāḥ iti hetoḥ lakṣyante iti sambandhaḥ
avinābhāvam upapādayati vibhāva ityādi
kāraṇa ityādi
rasam prati iti śeṣaḥ
samādhattema evam iti

agni ityādi
agneḥ dhūma avinābhūta tvāt iti bhāvaḥ
śabda arthaḥ iti dhūma śabda arthaḥ iti arthaḥ
ukta atiprasaṅgam purvapakṣī pariharati dhūma śabdasya ityādi
svārthā iti
svārthe dhūma tve tad viśiṣṭe vā
vā a śrānta tvāt paryavasita bodhana vyāpāra tvāt
tāvati a ga ni ādi arthe
tarhi jitam iti siddhānti aha āyātam ityādi
jīvitam iti

original: locanam nanvevaṃ dhūmāvagamanānantarāgnismaramavadvibhāvādipratipatyanantaraṃ ratyādicittavṛttipratipattarit śabdavyāpāra evātra nāsti /
analyzed: locanam nanu evam śabda vyāpāraḥ eva atra na asti

original: idaṃ tāvadayaṃ pratītisvarūpajño mīmāṃsakaḥ praṣṭavyaḥ--kimatra paracittavṛttimātre pratipattireva rasapratipattirabhimatā bhavataḥ?
analyzed: idam tāvat ayam pratīti svarūpa jñaḥ mīmāṃsakaḥ praṣṭavyaḥ kim atra para cittavṛtti mātre pratipattiḥ eva rasa pratipattiḥ abhimatā bhavataḥ
na ca evam bhramitavyam
evam hi loka gata citta vṛtti anumāna mātram iti kā rasa tā

original: yastvalaukikacamatkārātmā rasāsvādaḥ kāvyagatavibhāvādicarvaṇāprāṇo nāsau smaraṇānumānādisāmyena khilīkārapātrīkartavyaḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ tu alaukika camatkāra ātmā rasa āsvādaḥ kāvya gata vibhāva ādi carvaṇā prāṇaḥ na asau smaraṇa anumāna ādi sāmyena khilīkāra pātrīkartavyaḥ

original: kiṃ tu laukikena kāryakāraṇānumānādinā saṃskṛtahṛdayo vibhāvādikaṃ pratipadyamāna eva na tāṭasthyena pratipadyate,
analyzed: kim tu laukikena kārya kāraṇa anumāna ādinā saṃskṛta hṛdayaḥ vibhāva ādikam pratipadyamānaḥ eva na tāṭasthyena pratipadyate
api tu hṛdaya saṃvāda apara paryāya sahṛdaya tva paravaśa ukṛta tayā bāla priyā bījam iti arthaḥ
bījam jīvitami ca pāṭhaḥ
kutas iti atra āha sati ityādi
tasmin iti
mukhya artha bādhaḥ iti arthaḥ
samāne pi svārtha abhidhāna sāmarthye dhūma śabdaḥ svārthe viśrāmyati

original: 'gaṅgāyāṃ dhoṣa' ityatra gaṅgāśabdo netyatra mukhyārthabādha eva heturatasya eva lakṣaṇābījamityarthaḥ /
analyzed: gaṅgāyām dhoṣaḥ iti atra gaṅgā śabdaḥ na iti atra mukhya artha bādhaḥ eva hetuḥ atasya eva lakṣaṇā bījam iti arthaḥ

original: tarhihāpi mukhyārthabādho lakṣaṇā ca syat netyāha - na ceti /
analyzed: tarhi iha api mukhya artha bādhaḥ lakṣaṇā ca syat nā iti āha na ca iti
prasaṅga ādi niṣṭam āśabhaṅkate nanu evam ityādi

original: vibhāvādipratītyanantarabhāvinī ratyādipratītirdhūmādipratītijanyāgnyādismṛtisamānaiveti sā śabdavyāpārajanyā na bhavati dūre tasyā vyañjanājanyatvamityarthaḥ
analyzed: vibhāva ādi pratīti anantara bhāvinī rati ādi pratītiḥ dhūma ādi pratīti janyā agni ādi smṛti samānā eva iti sā śabda vyāpāra janyā na bhavati dūre tasyāḥ vyañjana ajanya tvam iti arthaḥ
vimatā rati ādi ptītiḥ na śābdī
śabda janya artha pratīti janya tvāt dhūma śabda janita artha pratīti janya aganyā ādi smṛti vat iti prayogaḥ
kim atra parakīya rati ādi cittavṛtti pratīteḥ śabda vyāpāra ajanya tvam
kiṃvā rasa pratīteḥ
ādye siddhasādhanam

original: dvitīye rasapratīteritarapratītivailakṣṇyena dṛṣṭāntābhāvo doṣa ityāśayena sopahāsaṃ pṛcchannāha--idamityādi /
analyzed: dvitīye rasa pratīteḥ itara pratīti vailakṣṇyena dṛṣṭānta abhāvaḥ doṣaḥ iti āśayena sa upahāsam pṛcchan āha edam ityādi
praśnam vivṛṇoti kim ityādi
atra iti
kāvyaḥ iti arthaḥ
na ca iti
evam bhramaḥ na kartavyaḥ iti arthaḥ
kutas iti atra āha evam hi ityādi
evam laukika cit tata vṛtti pratīteḥ eva rasa tva aṅgīkāre sati
mātram iti anantaram rasa pratītiḥ iti śeṣaḥ
kā rasatā iti
rasanīya tā nimittakaḥ hi rasa śabda vyavahāraḥ
na ca anumiti rūpāyāḥ pratīteḥ rasanīya tvam asti vahni ādi anumitiṣu anupalambhāt iti arthaḥ
kā tarhi rasa pratītiḥ iti atas āha yaḥ tu ityādi
alaukika iti anena laukika sukha āsvādaḥ vyāvartyate
alaukika tve hetum darśayan tasya kāraṇam āha kāvya iti
na asau iti
smaraṇa anumāna sāmyena iti asya khilīkāre nvayaḥ
laukikena iti loke bhavatā iti arthaḥ
kāryā iti
kāryam vahni ādeḥ dhūma ādi
rati ādi cittavṛtteḥ kaṭākṣa ādi
kāraṇam vahni ādi
rati ādi ca kāryeṇa yat kāraṇasya anumānam
ādi padena arthāpatteḥ saṅgrahaḥ

original: tene saṃskṛtahṛdaya ityanena tatsaṃskāro 'pi pratipattuḥ rasapratītāvupayogīti darśitam /
analyzed: tene saṃskṛta hṛdayaḥ iti anena tad saṃskāraḥ pi pratipattuḥ rasa pratītau upayogī iti darśitam
vibhāva ādikam iti
pramadā ādikam iti arthaḥ
pratipadyamānaḥ eva iti
kāvyāt nāṭyāt vā iti śeṣaḥ
tāṭasthyena iti
anyadīya tvena iti arthaḥ
na pratipadyate iti atra api vibhāva ādikam iti asya sambandhaḥ
katham tarhi tad prītiḥ iti atas āha api tu ityādi
hṛdaya iti
locanam pūrṇībhaviṣyat rasa āsvāda aṅkurībhāvena anumāna smaraṇa ādi saraṇiman āruhya eva tanmayībhavana ucita carvaṇā prāṇa tayā

original: na cāsau carvaṇā pramāṇāntarato jātā pūrvaṃ,
analyzed: na ca asau carvaṇā pramāṇa antarataḥ jātā pūrvam
yena idānīm smṛtiḥ syāt
na ca adhunā kutaścid pramāṇa antarāt utpannā
alaukike pratyakṣa ādi a vyāpārāt
atas eva alaukikaḥ eva vibhāva ādi vyavahāraḥ

original: yadāha--'vibhāvo vijñānārthaḥ loke kāraṇamevābhidhīyate na vibhāvaḥ /
analyzed: yat āha vibhāvaḥ vijñāna arthaḥ loke kāraṇam eva abhidhīyate na vibhāvaḥ
anubhāvaḥ pi alaukikaḥ eva
yat ayam anubhāvayati vāc aṅga sattva kṛtaḥ bhinayaḥ tasmāt anubhāvaḥ iti
tad cittavṛtti tanmayībhavanam eva hi anubhavanam
tu kāryam eva ucyate na anubhāvaḥ

original: ata eva parakīyā na cittavṛttirgamyata ityabhiprāyeṇa 'vibhāvānubhāvavyabhicārisaṃyogādrasaniṣpattiḥ' iti sūtre sthāyigrahaṇaṃ na kṛtam /
analyzed: atas eva parakīyā na cittavṛttiḥ gamyate iti abhiprāyeṇa vibhāva anubhāva vyabhicāri saṃyogāt rasa niṣpattiḥ iti sūtre sthāyi grahaṇam na kṛtam
tat pratyuta śalya bhūtam syāt
sthāyinaḥ tu rasībhāvaḥ aucityāt ucyate
tat vi bāla priyā hṛdayasya saṃvādaḥ sammatiḥ
tad apara paryāyam yat sahṛdaya tvam tad para vaśīkṛta tayā tad balāt iti arthaḥ
pūrṇī iti
pūrṇībhaviṣyan yaḥ rasa āsvādaḥ tasya kalpataroḥ caturvarga upāya vyutpatti phaliṣyataḥ ṅkurībhāvena hetunā iti arthaḥ
anumāna iti
anumiti smṛti ādi upāyam vyāpti jñāna ādikam an ālambya eva iti arthaḥ
tad mayī iti

original: sahṛdayānāṃ yattattaccittavṛttitanmayībhavanaṃ tasyocitā yā carvaṇā arthādvibhāvādeḥ tatprāṇatayā tadupayogitvenetyarthaḥ /
analyzed: sahṛdayānām yat tat tat cittavṛtti tanmayībhavanam tasya ucitā yā carvaṇā arthāt vibhāva ādeḥ tad prāṇatayā tad upayogi tvena iti arthaḥ
sādhāraṇyena iti yāvat
vibhāva ādikam pratipadyate iti anuṣaṅgaḥ
vibhāva ādīnām sādhāraṇyena pratītau eva rasa carvaṇā iti anyatra spaṣṭam
smṛti ādi rūpa tvat nirākaroti na ca ityādi
atas eva iti
rasa pratīteḥ alaukika tvāt eva tad kāraṇeṣu alaukikaḥ vibhāva ādi vyavahāraḥ iti arthaḥ
yat āha iti
muniḥ iti śeṣaḥ
vibhāvaḥ vijñāna arthaḥ iti

original: viśiṣṭatayā bhāvyante jñāyante sthāyivyabhicāriṇo 'neneti vibhāvaḥ pramadodyānādiḥ /
analyzed: viśiṣṭa tayā bhāvyante jñāyante sthāyi vyabhicāriṇaḥ nena iti vibhāvaḥ pramadā udyāna ādiḥ
na khalu anubhāvāt eva citta vṛtteḥ viśiṣya jñānam jāyate
bāṣpa ādeḥ anubhāvasya aneka hetu janya tva sambhavāt iti arthaḥ
lokaḥ ityādi

original: cittavṛttihetuṣu loke kāramamityeva vyavahāro na tu vibhāva itītyarthaḥ /
analyzed: cittavṛtti hetuṣu loke kāramam iti eva vyavahāraḥ na tu vibhāvaḥ iti iti arthaḥ
yat ayam iti
ayam abhinayaḥ iti anvayaḥ
anubhāvayati iti
sthāyi vyabhicāriṇaḥ iti śeṣaḥ
anubhāvaḥ iti iti anantataram ucyate iti śeṣaḥ
sāmājika sahṛdaya gata tad tad cittavṛtteḥ vibhāvanā ādinā vibhāva ādi vyapadeśaḥ iti ca rasagahgādhara ādau uktam
atra anubhavanam laukika anu bhavanāt vilakṣaṇam iti ahata cittavṛtti iti
na parakīya citta vṛti avagama mātram iha anubhavanam

original: kintu tāsāṃ cittavṛttīnāṃ sthāyyādirūpāṇāṃ sambandhi yatsāmājikānāṃ tanmayībhavanaṃ,
analyzed: kintu tāsām citta vṛttīnām sthāyi ādi rūpāṇām sambandhi yat sāmājikānām tanmayībhavanam
tad tad cittavṛtti bhāvanayā tad sajātīya svīya cittavṛtteḥ udbodhanena anubhavanam tat eva iti arthaḥ
ukta arthe pramāṇam āha atas eva ityādi

original: ata eva yasmādanubhavanamuktarūpameva na parakīyacittavṛtyanumitimātraṃ tasmāddhetorevetyarthaḥ /
analyzed: atas eva yasmāt anubhavanam ukta rūpam eva na parakīya citta vṛti anumiti mātram tasmāt hetoḥ eva iti arthaḥ
na parakīya ityādi
kintu svīyā cittavṛttiḥ eva sāmājikaiḥ tadā anubhūyate iti arthaḥ
na kṛtam iti
kasya iti ākāṅkṣā śāntaye sūtre sthāyinaḥ locanam bhāva anubhāva ucita cittavṛtti saṃskāra sundara carvaṇa udayāt
hṛdaya saṃvāda upayogi loka cittavṛtti para jñāna avasthāyām udyāna pulaka ādibhiḥ stāyi bhūta rati ādi avagamāt ca

original: vyabhicārī tu cittavṛttyātmatve 'pi mukhyacittavṛttiparavaśa eva carvyata iti vibhāvānubhāvamadhye gaṇitaḥ /
analyzed: vyabhicārī tu cittavṛtti ātma tve mukhya cittavṛtti paravaśaḥ eva carvyate iti vibhāva anubhāva madhye gaṇitaḥ
atas eva rasyamāna tāyāḥ eṣā eva niṣpattiḥ
yat prabandha pravṛtta bandhu samāgama ādi kāraṇa udita harṣa ādi laukika cittavṛtti nyagbhāvena carvaṇā rūpa tvam
atas carvaṇā atra abhiviyañjanam eva
na tu jñāpanam
pramāṇa vyāpāra vat
na api utpādanam
hetu vyāpāra vat

original: bālapriyā iti ṣaṣṭhyantasthāyigrahame kartavye 'pyanubhāvagrahaṇenaiva sthāyipratītirbhavatīti tanna kṛtamityarthaḥ /
analyzed: bālapriyāḥ iti ṣaṣṭhī anta sthāyi grahame kartavye pi anubhāva grahaṇena eva sthāyi pratītiḥ bhavati iti tat na kṛtam iti arthaḥ
yadi atra sthāyi grahaṇam kriyeta
tarhi syāt iti āha tat ityādi
tat sthāyi grahaṇa karaṇam
śalya iti
parakīya cittavṛti avagamaḥ rasaḥ iti artha pratīti kāri tvena aniṣṭa janakam bhavet iti arthaḥ

original: nanvevaṃ 'sthāyī raso bhavatī'tyādi tatra tatra sūtrakārādivacanaṃ kathaṃ ghaṭetetyata āha--sthāyinastviti /
analyzed: nanu evam sthāyī rasaḥ bhavati ityādi tatra tatra sūtrakāra ādi vacanam katham ghaṭeta iti atas āha sthāyinaḥ tu iti
tad tad nāyaka ādi gata sthāyinaḥ tu iti arthaḥ
aucityam eva spaṣṭayati tat iti

original: tasya paragatasthāyinaḥ sambandhino ye vibhāvānubhāvāḥ taducitāyāścittavṛttessahṛdayātmani yassaṃskārastasyodbodhena sundaracarvaṇāyā udayādityarthaḥ
analyzed: tasya para gata sthāyinaḥ sambandhinaḥ ye vibhāva anubhāvāḥ tad ucitāyāḥ citta vṛtteḥ sahṛdaya ātmani yaḥ saṃskāraḥ tasya udbodhena sundara carvaṇāyāḥ udayāt iti arthaḥ

original: uktañca kāvyānuśāsanavyākhyāne 'aucityantu tatsthāyigatatvena kāraṇāditayā prasiddhānāmadhunā carvaṇopayogitayā vibhāvāditvālambanādi'ti /
analyzed: uktam ca kāvyānuśāsana vyākhyāne aucityantu tad sthāyi gata tvena kāraṇa ādi tayā prasiddhānām adhunā carvaṇa upayogi tayā vibhāva ādi tva ālambanāt iti
tthāyinaḥ rasa tva vyapadeśe nimitta antaram ca asti iti āha hṛdaya iti

original: rasacarvaṇā hi hṛdayasaṃvādapurassarī hṛdayasaṃvāde ca nidānaṃ,
analyzed: rasa carvaṇā hi hṛdaya saṃvāda purassarī hṛdaya saṃvāde ca nidānam

original: tasyāñcāvasthāyāṃ pramadādibhiḥ kāraṇaiḥ pulakādibhiḥ kāryaiśca bhūyo bhūyo 'vadhṛtasvakāraṇavyāptikaiḥ sthāyino ratyāderavagamo bhavati,
analyzed: tasyām ca avasthāyām pramadā ādibhiḥ kāraṇaiḥ pulaka ādibhiḥ kāryaiḥ ca bhūyas bhūyas sthāyinaḥ rati ādeḥ avagamaḥ bhavati
tasmāt ca iti arthaḥ

original: nanu cittavṛttitvāviśeṣātsyāyīva vyabhicāryapi sūtre grahaṇaṃ nārhatītyata āha---vyabhicārītviti /
analyzed: nanu citta vṛtti tva aviśeṣāt syāyī iva vyabhicārī api sūtre grahaṇam na arhati iti atas āha vyabhicārī tu iti

original: vyabhicāriṇaḥ sthāyicittavṛttiṃ prati guṇatvena vibhāvādiprāyatvāttanmadhye sa nirdiṣṭa ityarthaḥ /
analyzed: vyabhicāriṇaḥ sthāyi cittavṛttim prati guṇa tvena vibhāva ādi prāya tvāt tad madhye sa nirdiṣṭaḥ iti arthaḥ
prasaṅgāt sūtra uktām rasa niṣpattim vivṛṇoti atas eva ityādi
rasyamāna tāyāḥ eṣā eva niṣpattiḥ iti
eṣā sūtra uktā niṣpattiḥ
rasyamāna tāyāḥ niṣpattiḥ eva iti arthaḥ

original: yathoktamabhinavabhāratyāṃ “kathantarhi sūtre niṣpattiriti neyaṃ rasasyāpi tu tadviṣayarasānāyāḥ tanniṣpattyā yadi tadekāyattajīvitasya rasasya
analyzed: yathā uktam abhinavabhāratyām katham tarhi sūtre niṣpattiḥ iti nā iyam rasasya api tu tad viṣaya rasānāyāḥ tad niṣpattyā yadi tad eka āyatta jīvitasya rasasya
tadā na kiñcid atra doṣaḥ iti
kā nāma eṣā rasyamāna tā iti atas tad svarūpam āha yat ityādi
prabandha iti

original: prabandhena pravṛttaṃ yadbandhusamāgamādikāraṇaṃ tenoditā yā harṣādilaukikacittavṛttiḥ tasyā nyagbhāvena adhaḥkaraṇena tadvyatirekeṇeti yāvat
analyzed: prabandhena pravṛttam yat bandhu samāgama ādi kāraṇam tena uditā yā harṣa ādi laukika cittavṛttiḥ tasyāḥ nyagbhāvena adhaḥkaraṇena tad vyatirekeṇa iti yāvat
carvaṇāyāḥ svarūpam āha atas ca ityādi
atas laukika cittavṛtti vailakṣaṇyena alaukika tvāt
atra carvaṇā rasa viṣaya carvaṇā
evakāra vyāvartyam darśayati na tu ityādi
yathā pramāṇānām indriya ādīnām jñāpanam vyāpāraḥ

original: yathā vā daṇḍavakrādīnāmutpādanaṃ vyāpārastathā locanam nanu yadi neyaṃ jñaptirna vā niṣpattiḥ,
analyzed: yathā vā daṇḍa vakra ādīnām utpādanam vyāpāraḥ tathā locanam nanu yadi nā iyam jñaptiḥ na vā niṣpattiḥ
tarhi kim etat
na tu ayam asau alaukikaḥ rasaḥ
nanu vibhāva ādiḥ atra kim jñāpakaḥ hetuḥ
uta kārakaḥ
na jñāpakaḥ na kārakaḥ
api tu carvaṇā upayogī
nanu kva etat daṣṭam anyatra

original: yata eva na dṛṣṭaṃ tata evālaukikamityuktam /

nanu evam pramāṇam syāt
astu kim tatas

nanu apramāṇakam etat na
sva saṃvedana siddha tvāt

atas ca rasaḥ yama laukikaḥ
yena rasam prati vyañjaka tvam
kā tatra lakṣaṇāyāḥ śaṅkā api

original: hi tadeva kāvyaṃ punaḥ punaḥ bālapriyā vibhāvādīnāṃ na jñāpanaṃ na vā utpādanaṃ vyāpāra ityarthaḥ /
analyzed: hi tat eva kāvyam punar punar bālapriyā vibhāva ādīnām na jñāpanam na vā utpādanam vyāpāraḥ iti arthaḥ
śaṅkate nanu ityādi
pūrva uktena iyam rasa carvaṇā na jñapti rūpā

etat iti
rasa carvaṇā rūpam iti arthaḥ
uttaram āha nanu ayam ityādi
jñapti utpatti ayogya tvam alaukika tvāt rasasya bhūṣaṇam bhavati iti bhāvaḥ

original: nanu jñāpakatvasya kārakatvasya vā abhāve vibhāvādīnāṃ rasapratītyarthamupādānaṃ vyarthaṃ,
analyzed: nanu jñāpaka tvasya kāraka tvasya vā abhāve vibhāva ādīnām rasa pratīti artham upādānam vyartham

hetoḥ kāraka tva jñāpaka tva anyatara niyamaḥ hi laukikaḥ

original: vibhāvādestu tadabhāve 'pi carvaṇopayogitvānnānarthakayamityāśayena pariharati---na jñāpaka ityādi /
analyzed: vibhāva ādeḥ tu tad abhāve pi carvaṇa upayogi tvāt na anarthakayam iti āśayena pariharati na jñāpakaḥ ityādi
tad upari śaṅkate nanu iti
samādhatta iyatas iti
punar api śaṅkate nanu iti
evam iti
rasasya alaukika tve sati iti arthaḥ
rasaḥ pramāṇam syāt iti
apramāṇa tve ca śubha aśubha prāpti parihāra upāya vyutpādaka tvan na bhavet iti bhāvaḥ
apramāṇa tva āpāte pi kārya kāri tvam asti iti āha astu iti
prītiḥ ca vyutpattiḥ ca tayoḥ
yat vā aprīti pūrvikā vyutpattiḥ tasyāḥ siddheḥ iti arthaḥ

original: nanvevamalaukikatve rasasya tatsādhakaṃ pramāṇaṃ nāstīti śaṅkate---nanviti /

yathā uktam abhinava bhāratyām rasanā ca bodha rūpā eva

original: vācakaśabdaikagamyatve hi rasasya vācyārthavallaukikatvaṃ kathañcicchakyaśaṅkamanuprāsādināpi vācakatvaśūnyena vyaṅgyatvamastyeva /
analyzed: vācaka śabda eka gamya tve hi rasasya vācyārtha vat laukika tvam kathañcid śakya śaṅkam anuprāsa ādinā api vācaka tva śūnyena vyaṅgya tvam asti eva

original: na cānuprāsavyaṅgyaṃ vastu loke dṛṣṭacaramato 'pi rasasyālaukikatvaṃ siddhamityarthaḥ /

original: abhidhāyā evābhāve tatpṛṣṭhavartinyā lakṣaṇāyāḥ prasaṅga eva nāstītyarthaḥ /

original: ata eva grandhakāraḥ sāmānyena vivakṣitānyaparavācye dhvanau bhakterabhāvamabhyadhāt /

original: dhvanilakṣaṇakaraṇaṃ niṣphalaṃ lakṣaṇaphalasyetaravyāvṛttatayā dhvanijñānasyopalakṣaṇabhūtayā bhakatyaiva samabhavādityarthaḥ /
analyzed: dhvani lakṣaṇa karaṇam niṣphalam lakṣaṇa phalasya itara vyāvṛtta tayā dhvani jñānasya upalakṣaṇa bhūtayā bhakatyā eva samabhavāt iti arthaḥ
tad abhidhā ityādi samādhāna granthasya bhāva artham vivṛṇoti abhidhāna ityādi
abhidhāna abhidheya bhāvaḥ iti
kāvyena saha iti śeṣaḥ
tāvatā kim atas āha tatas ca iti
abhidhā vṛtte sambhāvyeta

original: yadi ca guṇavṛttyaiva dhvanirlakṣyata ityucyate tadabhidhāvyāpāreṇa taditaro 'laṅkāravargaḥ samagra eva lakṣyata iti pratyekamalaṅkārāṇāṃ lakṣaṇakaraṇavaiyarthyaprasaṅgaḥ
analyzed: yadi ca guṇa vṛttyā eva dhvaniḥ lakṣyate iti ucyate tad abhidhā vyāpāreṇa tad itaraḥ laṅkāra vargaḥ samagraḥ eva lakṣyate iti pratyekam alaṅkārāṇām lakṣaṇa karaṇa vaiyarthya prasaṅgaḥ
kim ca

original: lakṣaṇe 'nyaiḥ kṛte cāsya pakṣa-saṃsiddhir eva naḥ // DhvK_1.19a //
analyzed: lakṣaṇe nyaiḥ kṛte ca asya pakṣa saṃsiddhiḥ eva naḥ
lakṣaṇe nyaiḥ kṛte ca asya pakṣa saṃsiddhiḥ eva naḥ
kṛte vā pūrvam eva anyaiḥ dhvani lakṣaṇe pakṣa saṃsiddhiḥ eva naḥ
yasmāt dhvaniḥ asti iti na pakṣaḥ

original: sa ca prāgeva saṃsiddha ityayatnasampannasamīhitārthāḥ saṃvṛttāḥ ramaḥ /
analyzed: sa ca prāk eva saṃsiddhaḥ iti ayatna sampanna samīhita arthāḥ saṃvṛttāḥ ramaḥ

original: ye 'pi sahṛdayahṛdayasaṃvedyamanākhyeyameva dhvanerātmānamāmnāsiṣuste 'pi na parikṣya vādinaḥ /
analyzed: ye pi sahṛdaya hṛdaya saṃvedyam anākhyeyam eva dhvaneḥ ātmānam āmnāsiṣuḥ te pi na parikṣya vādinaḥ
locanam samagra bhedam lakṣayiṣyanti jñāsyanti ca
kim tad lakṣaṇena iti āśaṅkya āha yadi ca iti
abhidāna abhidheya bhāvaḥ hi alaṅkā gaṇām vyāpakaḥ
tatas ca abhidhā vṛtte vaiyākaraṇa mīmāṃsakaiḥ nirūpite kutra idānīm alaṅkāra kāraṇām vyāpāraḥ

original: tathā hetubalātkāryaṃ jāyata iti tārkikairukte kimidānīmiśvaraprabhṛtīnāṃ kartṝṇāṃ jñātṝṇāṃ vā kṛtyamapūrvaṃ syāditi sarvo nirārambhaḥ syāt
analyzed: tathā hetu balāt kāryam jāyate iti tārkikaiḥ ukte kim idānīm iśvara prabhṛtīnām kartṝṇām jñātṝṇām vā kṛtyam apūrvam syāt iti sarvaḥ nirārambhaḥ syāt
tat āha lakṣaṇa karaṇa vaiyarthya prasaṅgaḥ iti
mā bhūt vā apūrva unmīlanam pūrva unmīlitam eva asmābhiḥ samyak nirūpitam

asmad prayatnāt iti śeṣaḥ
evam tri prakāram abhāva vādam
bhakti antarbhūta tām ca nirākurvatā alakṣaṇīya tvam eka tad madhye nirākṛtam eva

original: ata eva mūlakārikā sākṣāttannirākaraṇārthā na śrūyate /
analyzed: atas eva mūla kārikā sākṣāt tad nirākaraṇa arthā na śrūyate

original: vṛttikṛttu nirākṛtamapi prameyaśayyāpūraṇāya kaṇṭhena bālapriyā abhidhāvyāpāre /

alaṅkāra kāraṇām iti
alaṅkāra grantha kartṝṇām iti arthaḥ

original: abhidhānābhidheyabhāvasya samastālaṅkāravyāpakatvāttasya cābhidhāvayāpārajīvitatvāttannirūpaṇe kṛte satyalaṅkāranirūpaṇaṃ tadgranthakārāṇāṃ  #
analyzed: abhidhāna abhidheya bhāvasya samasta alaṅkāra vyāpaka tvāt tasya ca abhidhā vayāpāra jīvita tvāt tad nirūpaṇe kṛte sati alaṅkāra nirūpaṇam tat granthakārāṇām
niṣphalam eva bhavet iti arthaḥ

sarvaḥ nirārambhaḥ syāt iti
sarvarḥ iśvara prabhṛtiḥ kartṛ jñātṛ vargaḥ
vyākhyātam artham granthena saṅgamayati tat āha iti
lakṣaṇa karuṇa vaiyarthya prasaṅgaḥ iti
lakṣaṇam ca karaṇam ca lakṣaṇa karaṇe
tayoḥ tad nirūpaṇayoḥ vaiyarthyasya prasaṅgaḥ iti arthaḥ

apūrva unmīlanam mā bhūt iti anvayaḥ

original: nanu kārikākāreṇa itarapakṣa ivālakṣaṇīyatvapakṣaḥ kimiti na pratikṣipta iti śaṅkāṃ pariharan 'ye 'pī'tyādigranthamavatārayati---evamityādi
analyzed: nanu kārikā ākāreṇa itara pakṣe iva alakṣaṇīya tva pakṣaḥ kim iti na pratikṣiptaḥ iti śaṅkām pariharan ye pi ityādi grantham avatārayati evam ityādi
nirākṛtam eva iti
dhvani pradarśana mukhena hi pakṣa antara nirākaraṇam atra kṛtam

original: na ca tasyālakṣaṇīyatve tatsambhavati iti tannirākaraṇanāntarīyakatvenālakṣaṇīyatvapakṣo 'pi nirākṛta ityarthaḥ /
analyzed: na ca tasya alakṣaṇīya tve tat sambhavati iti tad nirākaraṇa nāntarīyaka tvena alakṣaṇīya tva pakṣaḥ api nirākṛtaḥ iti arthaḥ

original: nanu tarhi kimiti vṛttikṛtā tatpakṣo 'nūdya nirākṛta ityata āha---vṛttikṛditi /
analyzed: nanu tarhi kim iti vṛtti kṛtā tad pakṣaḥ nūdya nirākṛtaḥ iti atas āha vṛtti kṛt iti
prameya śayyā iti

original: prameyasya śayyā sanniveśaviśeṣaḥ yata uktayā nītyā vakṣyamāṇayā ca dhvaneḥ sāmānyaviśeṣalakṣaṇe pratipādite 'pi yadyanākhyeyatvaṃ tatsarveṣāmeva  #
analyzed: prameyasya śayyā sanniveśa viśeṣaḥ yatas uktayā nītyā vakṣyamāṇayā ca dhvaneḥ sāmānya viśeṣa lakṣaṇe pratipādite yadi anākhyeyatvam tat sarveṣām eva
vastūnām tat prasaktam

original: yadi punardhvanerātiśayoktyānayā kāvyāntarātiśāyi taiḥ locanam tatpakṣamanūdya nirākaroti---ye 'pītyādinā /
analyzed: yadi punar dhvaneḥ ātiśayoktyā anayā kāvya antara atiśāyi taiḥ locanam tad pakṣam anūdya nirākaroti ye pi ityādinā

original: uktayā nītyā 'yatrārthaḥ śabdo vā' iti sāmānyalakṣaṇaṃ pratipāditam /
analyzed: uktayā nītyā yatra arthaḥ śabdaḥ vā iti sāmānya lakṣaṇam pratipāditam

original: vakṣyamāṇayā tu nītyā viśeṣalakṣaṇaṃ bhaviṣyati 'arthāntare saṅkramitaṃ ityādinā /
analyzed: vakṣyamāṇayā tu nītyā viśeṣa lakṣaṇam bhaviṣyati artha antare saṅkramitam ityādinā

original: tatra prathamoddyote dhvaneḥ sāmānyalakṣaṇameva kārikākāreṇa kṛtam /
analyzed: tatra prathama uddyote dhvaneḥ sāmānya lakṣaṇam eva kārikā ākāreṇa kṛtam

original: dvitīyoddyote kārikākāro 'vāntaravibhāgaṃ viśeṣalakṣaṇaṃ ca vidadhadanuvādamukhena mūlavibhāgaṃ dvividhaḥ' iti /
analyzed: dvitīya uddyote kārikā kāraḥ vā antara vibhāgam viśeṣa lakṣaṇam ca vidadhat anuvāda mukhena mūla vibhāgam dvividhaḥ iti
sarveṣām iti
laukikānām śāstrīyāṇām ca iti arthaḥ
atiśayoktyā iti

original: yathā 'tānyakṣarāṇi hṛdaye kimapi sphuranti' itivadatiśayoktyānākhyeyatoktā sārarūpatāṃ pratipādayitumiti darśitamiti śivam // 19 //
analyzed: yathā tāni akṣarāṇi hṛdaye kim api sphuranti itivat atiśayoktyā anākhyeyatā uktā sāra rūpa tām pratipādayitum iti darśitam iti śivam  /
bāla priyā tasyāḥ pūraṇāya

original: anākhyeyatvapakṣasyāpi svayamanirākaraṇe tatpūraṇaṃ na bhavediti bhāvaḥ /
analyzed: anākhyeya tva pakṣasya api svayam anirākaraṇe tat pūraṇam na bhavet iti bhāvaḥ

original: uktayā nītyetyādau yathāsaṃkhyena sambandha ityāśayenopapādayati---yatrārtha ityādi /

analyzed: vṛttau sa ca dvividhaḥ ityādinā viśeṣa lakṣaṇa kathanam kārikākāra āśaya anusāreṇa iti āha tatra prathama udyote ityādi

original: kintvatiśayittvāditi cettarhi tadabhidhānaṃ yuktamevetyāha vṛttau---'yadi punari'tyādi /
